dt-example.title: Custom picker format
dt-example.info:
ColumnControl will attempt to use the same format for the date picker as the data in the source column. However, sometimes you might wish to specify your own format - this can be done using the `format` option for `-content searchDateTime` (and proxies by `-content search`).
This example shows the DataTable showing the date information in the table in a locale specific format, while the date picker uses an ISO8601 date format.
